responseText: NSLOCTEXT("", "1114F70243AE4705009E4C8605EEBB32", "\"I have landed in a time of \"great undying!\" The land smells of death. I remember this. My ARDIS had delivered me to sometime else. I found myself tossed in high grass and it is from there I spied a sinister army of minotaur crusaders, the Revenant Reapers, pillaging and plundering my precious tower. Before I could conceive of a plan to eradicate the minos, something shocking occured. The Tower Arcana had vanished leaving me in the midst of another war against the forces of evil.\" ")
name: MIDD_0015_PTS_ClockworkCodex_6
